title: Investigate an Inventory Discrepancy
description: A cycle count has revealed a significant discrepancy for a high-value item. A manager needs to investigate the cause.

tasks.description: Review the cycle count results that show the discrepancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager confirms the difference between the system quantity and the physical count.

tasks.description: Review the full transaction history for the item over the last month (sales, receipts, transfers).
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager analyzes the item's movement history to look for errors.

tasks.description: After finding no errors, conclude the discrepancy is likely due to theft and make an inventory adjustment to correct the on-hand quantity, noting 'Shrinkage' as the reason.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system's inventory is corrected, and the loss is properly categorized.
